intro: This document provides a comprehensive description of the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS) products, which are part of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. It details the specifications, formats, attribute tables, and metadata associated with the EGMS Basic, Calibrated, and Ortho products. Furthermore, the document outlines the processing methodologies employed, including InSAR techniques and the integration of GNSS data for georeferencing, ensuring users have a thorough understanding of the products and their appropriate use.
